name: No Active for GravityForms
author: WPGear

sections.description:
If the GF Form has the “is_active” option = False, then when it is displayed via the Shortcode [gravityform id=’…’], an empty Page is usually displayed.
Such behavior may cause confusion and questions from Users.
And even the owner of the Site will not always be able to immediately understand what is happening.

Plugin “No Active for GravityForms” displays a normal Message that this Form is not Active.
And everything immediately becomes clear. Everyone is happy. ))

Futured

  • Works with PHP 7.4
  • Works with Gravity Forms versions 2.3.3.4 and higher. Tested up to 2.5.7.1

  • You can change the appearance of the Message through CSS Styles.

    PRO Version Features:

  • Separate Messages & Control for each Forms.
sections.installation:
1. Upload ‘noactive-for-gravityforms’ folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. If you have any problems – please ask for support.

short_description: Displays a message that the Form is not Active, instead of a blank page.
